name: Will-o'-the-wisp
desc: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage .
notes:
The Will-o'-the-wisp is a returning item in Risk of Rain 2. 
1 second after the holder kills an enemy, a fiery blast spawns where that enemy died. The blast has a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius and deals 350% (+280% per stack) base damage. This damage suffers from sweet spot damage falloff.
The explosion has a proc coefficient of 1.0.


== Math ==


== Tips ==
Stacking both Will-o'-the-wisps and  Crowbars can allow the player to rapidly chain together kills against grouped enemies, or at the very least inflict heavy damage.
This is especially effective with the Artifact of Swarms enabled.
Using the Will-o'-the-wisp with the  Forgive Me Please allows the player to throw the doll at enemies for effective area damage.
The knock-back effect created from the explosion can scatter targets, which is not only useful for crowd control, but can also send light airborne targets like   Lesser Wisps and   Jellyfish crashing against terrain, dealing massive damage.
